Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: I should be able to look at the transactions in the ledger
Issue.description: As per unicorn's SOW requirement number 1.4.1.e: As a presenter presenting unicorn's phase0 demo script I should be able to:# Look at the transaction files in the ledger# Read and understand the transaction files in the ledger Krishnan The functionality is already in place. The estimate provided is to do the documentation to explain the contents of the ledger.
